title: Altinn layout
description: Schema that describes the layout configuration for Altinn applications.

data.title: The layout data
data.description: Contains data describing the layout configuration.

layout.title: The layout
layout.description: Array of components to be presented in the layout.

id.title: id
id.description: The component ID. Must be unique within all layouts/pages in a layout-set. Cannot end with <dash><number>.

required.title: Required
required.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component is required when filling in the form. Defaults to false.

readOnly.title: Read only
readOnly.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component should be presented as read only. Defaults to false.

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

textResourceBindings.title: Text resource bindings
textResourceBindings.description: Text resource bindings for a component.

dataModelBindings.title: Data model bindings
dataModelBindings.description: Data model bindings for a component.

labelSettings.title: Label settings
labelSettings.description: A collection of settings for how the component label should be rendered.

optionalIndicator.title: Optional indicator
optionalIndicator.description: Controls whether the text that is indicating that a field is optional should be displayed.

grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Settings for the components grid. Used for controlling horizontal alignment.

variant.title: Panel variant
variant.description: Change the look of the panel.

showIcon.title: Show icon
showIcon.description: Boolean value indicating if the icon should be shown.

maxFileSizeInMB.title: Maximum file size in MB
maxFileSizeInMB.description: Sets the maximum file size allowed in megabytes.

maxNumberOfAttachments.title: Maximum allowed attachments
maxNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the maximum number of attachments allowed to upload.

minNumberOfAttachments.title: Minimum allowed attachments
minNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the minimum number of attachments to upload

displayMode.title: Display mode
displayMode.description: Sets the display mode for the file upload component.

hasCustomFileEndings.title: Has custom file endings
hasCustomFileEndings.description: Boolean value indicating if the component has valid file endings

validFileEndings.title: Valid file endings
validFileEndings.description: A separated string of valid file endings to upload. If not set all endings are accepted.

optionsId.title: Options ID
optionsId.description: Reference to connected options by id.

minDate.title: Minimum allowed date
minDate.description: Sets the minimum allowed date. Can also use keyword 'today' to disable all past dates dynamically based on the current date. Defaults to 1900-01-01T12:00:00.000Z.

maxDate.title: Maximum allowed date
maxDate.description: Sets the maximum allowed date. Can also use keyword 'today' to disable all future dates dynamically based on the current date. Defaults to 2100-01-01T12:00:00.000Z.

timeStamp.title: Time stamp
timeStamp.description:
Boolean value indicating if the date time should be stored as a timeStamp. Defaults to true.
 If true: 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ', if false 'YYYY-MM-DD';

format.title: Date format
format.description: Long date format used when displaying the date to the user. The user date format from the locale will be prioritized over this setting.

showBackButton.title: Show back button
showBackButton.description: Shows two buttons (back/next) instead of just 'next'.

compact.title: Compact navbar menu
compact.description: Change appearance of navbar as compact in desktop view

elements.title: Instance information choices
elements.description: The properties to include in the instanceInformation summary

dateSent.title: Date sent
dateSent.description: Date when the schema was sent.

referenceNumber.title: Schema reference number
referenceNumber.description: The reference number of the schema gathered from the instance Guid.

mapping.description: Creates a new app instance with data collected from a stateless part of the app.

url.title: Map layer url
url.description: Url to a map tile. {z}/{x}/{y} will be replaced with tile coordinates, {s} will be replaced with a random subdomain if subdomains are given

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Ascribing a work or remark to a particular unit for recognition

subdomains.title: Subdomains
subdomains.description: List of subdomains. Used for balancing the load on different map tiling servers. A random one will replace {s} in the defined url.

labelGrid.title: labelGrid
labelGrid.description: Optional grid for the component label. Used in combination with innerGrid to align labels on the side.

innerGrid.title: innerGrid
innerGrid.description: Optional grid for inner component content like input field or dropdown. Used to avoid inner content filling the component width.

rows.title: Rows
rows.description: An array of rows to be rendered in the grid.

header.title: Header?
header.description: A boolean indicating if the row should be a header row

readOnly.title: Read only?
readOnly.description: A boolean indicating if the row should be a read only row (yellow background)

cells.title: Grid row cells
cells.description: An array of cells to be rendered in the row

text.title: Text
text.description: The text or text resource ID to be rendered in the cell

component.title: Component ID
component.description: The ID of the component to be rendered in the cell

children.title: Children
children.description: An array of the "id" of child components belonging to the button group.

children.title: Children
children.description: An array of the "id" of child components belonging to the group.

hiddenRow.title: Hidden row
hiddenRow.description: Boolean to decide whether the row should be displayed.

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Alternatives for edit view of repeating group

panel.title: Panel
panel.description: Alternatives for panel view of repeating group

showGroupingIndicator.title: Show grouping indicator
showGroupingIndicator.description: Boolean to decide whether a vertical line indicating grouping of fields should be visible. Only relevant for non-repeating groups.

maxCount.title: Maximum count
maxCount.description: The maximum number of iterations of a group. Only relevant if group is repeating.

rowsBefore.title: Static rows before
rowsBefore.description: An array of rows to be rendered before the group table (using Grid component configuration)

rowsAfter.title: Static rows after
rowsAfter.description: An array of rows to be rendered after the group table (using Grid component configuration)

tableHeaders.title: Table Headers
tableHeaders.description: An array of the id of child components that should be included as table headers. If not defined all components are shown.

tableColumns.title: Table Columns
tableColumns.description: An object containing key-value pairs where the key is a table header and the value is an object containing settings for the headers column

editInTable.title: Edit in table
editInTable.description: Boolean to decide whether the component should be editable in table view

showInExpandedEdit.title: Show in expanded edit
showInExpandedEdit.description: Boolean to decide whether the component should be shown in the expanded edit view

mode.title: Edit mode
mode.description: Mode for how repeating group table is displayed in edit mode

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Conditions for filtering visible items in repeating group

saveButton.title: Save button
saveButton.description: Boolean or expression indicating whether save button should be shown or not for a given row

saveAndNextButton.title: Save and open next button
saveAndNextButton.description: Boolean or expression indicating whether save and go to next button should be shown or not in addition to save and close button

deleteButton.title: Delete button
deleteButton.description: Boolean or expression indicating whether delete button should be shown or not for a given row

editButton.title: Edit button
editButton.description: Boolean or expression indicating whether edit button should be shown or not for a given row

multiPage.title: Multi-page
multiPage.description: Boolean value indicating if form components in edit mode should be shown over multiple pages/views.

addButton.title: Add button
addButton.description: Boolean or expression indicating whether add new button should be shown or not under the table.

alwaysShowAddButton.title: Show add button on open group
alwaysShowAddButton.description: Boolean value indicating whether add new button should be shown or not under the table when a group is open.

openByDefault.title: Open by default
openByDefault.description: Boolean or string indicating if group should be opened by default. If no items exist: 'first', 'last', and true adds a new item. If items exist already, true does not open anything, but 'first' opens the first item, and 'last' opens the last item in the group.

alertOnDelete.title: Alert on delete
alertOnDelete.description: Boolean value indicating if warning popup should be displayed when attempting to delete a row

iconUrl.title: Icon url
iconUrl.description: Url of the icon to be shown in panel. Can be relative if hosted by app or full if referencing a cdn or other hosting.

iconAlt.title: Icon alt
iconAlt.description: Alternative text for the icon. Only applicable if iconUrl is provided. Can be plain text or a text resource reference.

groupReference.title: Group reference
groupReference.description: Reference to the group that is being displayed in the panel. Used for referencing another repeating group context.

group.title: Group
group.description: Group reference. Can be either the group id or the group data model binding.

key.title: Key
key.description: Key representing field in data model to check.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of cell in % or 'auto'. Defaults to 'auto'

alignText.title: Align Text
alignText.description: Choose text alignment between 'left', 'center', or 'right' for text in table cells. Defaults to 'left' for text and 'right' for numbers.

textOverflow.title: Text Overflow
textOverflow.description: Use this property to controll behaviour when text is too large to be displayed in table cell.

lineWrap.title: Line Wrap
lineWrap.description: Toggle line wrapping on or off. Defaults to true

maxHeight.title: Max Height
maxHeight.description: Determines the number of lines to display in table cell before hiding the rest of the text with an elipsis (...). Defaults to 2.

label.title: Label
label.description: The option label. Can be plain text or a text resource binding.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text or a text resource binding.

helpText.title: Help Text
helpText.description: A help text for the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text or a text resource binding.

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.description: An array of actions that should be triggered when data connected to this component changes.

optionsId.title: Options ID
optionsId.description: Reference to connected options by id.

options.title: Options
options.description: An array of options. Only relevant if no optionsId is set.

secure.title: Secure Options
secure.description: Boolean value indicating if the options should be instance aware. Defaults to false. See more on docs: https://docs.altinn.studio/app/development/data/options/

source.title: Source
source.description: Object to define a data model source to be used as basis for options. Can not be used if options or optionId is set. See more on docs: https://docs.altinn.studio/app/development/data/options/

group.title: Group
group.description: The repeating group to base options on.

label.title: Label
label.description: Reference to a text resource to be used as the option label.

value.title: Label
value.description: Field in the group that should be used as value

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text or a text resource binding.

helpText.title: Help Text
helpText.description: A help text for the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text or a text resource binding.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Define the layout style for the options

openInNewTab.title: Open in new tab
openInNewTab.description: Boolean value indicating if the link should be opened in a new tab. Defaults to false.

simplified.title: Simplified
simplified.description: Boolean value indicating if the address component should be shown in simple mode.

tagName.title: Tag name
tagName.description: Web component tag name to use

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to be triggered when the button is clicked.

componentRef.title: Component reference
componentRef.description: String value indicating which layout component (by ID) the summary is for.

pageRef.title: Page reference
pageRef.description: String value indicating which layout page the referenced component is defined on.

largeGroup.title: Large group
largeGroup.description: Boolean value indicating if summary of repeating group should be displayed in large format. Useful for displaying summary with nested groups.

excludedChildren.title: Excluded child components
excludedChildren.description: Array of component ids that should not be shown in a repeating group's summary

display.title: Display properties
display.description: Optional properties to configure how summary is displayed

hideChangeButton.title: Hide change button
hideChangeButton.description: Set to true if the change button should be hidden for the summary component. False by default.

hideBottomBorder.title: Hide bottom border
hideBottomBorder.description: Set to true to hide the blue dashed border below the summary component. False by default.

useComponentGrid.title: Use component grid
useComponentGrid.description: Set to true to allow summary component to use the grid setup of the referenced component. For group summary, this will apply for all group child components.

dataTypeIds.title: Data type IDs
dataTypeIds.description: List of data type IDs for the attachment list to show.

includePDF.title: Include PDF as attachments
includePDF.description: Set the flag if the list of attachments should include PDF of answers.

image.title: Image properties
image.description: Set of options for image field.

formatting.title: Input formatting
formatting.description: Set of options for formatting input fields.

variant.title: Input Variant
variant.description: An enum to choose if the inputfield it is a normal textfield or a searchbar

saveWhileTyping.title: Automatic saving while typing
saveWhileTyping.description: Boolean or number. True = feature on (default), false = feature off (saves on focus blur), number = timeout in milliseconds (400 by default)

currency.title: Language-sensitive number formatting based on currency
currency.description: Enables currency along with thousand and decimal separators to be language sensitive based on selected app language. They are configured in number property. Note: parts that already exist in number property are not overridden by this prop.

unit.title: Language-sensitive number formatting based on unit
unit.description: Enables unit along with thousand and decimal separators to be language sensitive based on selected app language. They are configured in number property. Note: parts that already exist in number property are not overridden by this prop.

position.title: Position of the currency/unit symbol (only when using currency or unit options)
position.description: Display the unit as prefix or suffix. Default is prefix

align.title: Align input
align.description: The alignment for Input field (eg. right aligning a series of numbers).

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.description: Controls the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

allowPopups.title: Allow popups
allowPopups.description: Sets "allow-popups" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.title: Allow popups to escape sandbox
allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.description: Sets "allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

tableHeaders.title: Table Headers
tableHeaders.description: An object where the fields in the datalist is mapped to headers. Must correspond to datalist representing a row. Can be added to the resource files to change between languages.

tableHeadersMobile.title: Table Headers Mobile
tableHeadersMobile.description: An array of strings representing the columns that is chosen to be shown in the mobile view.

sortableColumns.title: Sortable Columns
sortableColumns.description: An array of the columns that is going to be sortable. The column has to be represented by the the headername that is written in tableHeaders.

dataListId.title: List ID
dataListId.description: The Id of the list. This id is used to retrive the datalist from the backend.

secure.title: Secure ListItems
secure.description: Boolean value indicating if the options should be instance aware. Defaults to false.

bindingToShowInSummary.title: Binding to show in summary
bindingToShowInSummary.description: The value of this binding will be shown in the summary component for the list. This binding must be one of the specified bindings under dataModelBindings.

mapping.description: (Optional) Used to map data model paths to query parameters when fetching list data.

alternatives.title: Alternatives
alternatives.description: List of page sizes the user can choose from. Make sure to test the performance of the largest number of items per page you are allowing.

default.title: Default
default.description: The pagination size that is set to default.

breakBefore.title: Page break before
breakBefore.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added before the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

breakAfter.title: Page break after
breakAfter.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added after the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

autocomplete.title: HTML attribute: autocomplete
autocomplete.description: The HTML autocomplete attribute lets web developers specify what if any permission the user agent has to provide automated assistance in filling out form field values, as well as guidance to the browser as to the type of information expected in the field.
